about_the_game:
Blêktre 2081 is a "real life simulator" in which you can train yourself against the harshness of post-modern society: climb the ladder, from beggar to president, through the profession of cop, butcher, trader or welfare recipient, or die trying, but with cybernetic implants!

  • Compete with other inhabitants in this ruthless society. Seduce them, live as a couple, slap them, rob their businesses, or buy them out to send them into unemployment: interactions as lifelike as ever!

  • A unique and persistent instance: in Blêktreville, even when offline, your character continues to hold their jobs, just like in an idle game or Monopoly. Other characters consume from your businesses, and you keep getting richer day and night!

  • An open RPG with a narrative element, where you use all means to climb to the top of the socio-economic pyramid. Crush others in your brand-new gleaming KISLA, evolve in this post-capitalist dystopian world where the last source of food is unemployment sausages! And reach for the moon by becoming an Illuminati elite...

  • Free-to-play: the demo grants full access to the content! Instant access in free play or with an account, with achievements and skins to unlock as you progress.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains light and humorous depictions of activities such as drug trafficking, prostitution, the meat industry, banking, police repression.

short_description: Blêktre 2081 is a real-life simulator where you face the thrills and struggles of a capitalist society. Survive this harsh world and carve your own path in the society : be a cop, a trader, a dealer, a junkie, a welfare recipient, or just try to get by ! A required training for the near future.
